description: a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) = a(n-1) - GCT(a(n-2),a(n-1)) if nonnegative and not already in the sequence, else a(n) = a(n-1) + CT(a(n-2),a(n-1)), where CT(a,b) is the Comma transform (cf. A367360) of a and b, while GCT(a,b) is the largest possible generalized Command transform (cf. A367635) where at least one digit of both a and b can be chosen.
